nodes.bodyText: Not sure this is a good idea, there might be many failures which could clog the logs.
Yes, It could generate a lot of logs but we don't have any info on a failed runner. Is there a better way?
The metrics warp.script.run.failures is there to track the number of failures per script
The banner is not intended to be a log message, it should be output to stdout no matter what. Add an info message with the revision and a simple text.

Ok, revert it.
As stdout is redirected to the log file, it will be present is the warp10.log
Why is this in this PR?
The test no longer passed. Now it's ok -> revert
